lead_paragraph: FIFA President Gianni Infantino has defended the use of the video assistant referee system at the ongoing Club World Cup in Japan after the technology sparked controversy on both instances it was used.

headline.print_headline: Infantino Defends Use of Video Replays at Club World Cup
headline.main: Infantino Defends Use of Video Replays at Club World Cup
